code: import{StyleSheet}from'@react-pdf/renderer';import*as CardConstants from'../../components/Designer/utils/CardConstants.js';var DynamicStylesPDF=StyleSheet.create({page:{width:CardConstants.PDFDimensions.width,height:CardConstants.PDFDimensions.height,display:"block",position:"relative",color:"white",fontFamily:'Interstate Extra Light Condensed'},view:{display:"inline-block",position:"relative",height:"100%",width:"100%",whiteSpace:"nowrap"},image:{objectFit:"cover",height:"100%"},canvas:{width:CardConstants.PDFDimensions.width,height:CardConstants.PDFDimensions.height/2,position:"absolute",display:"block",bottom:0},textMain:{fontSize:CardConstants.PDFDimensions.mainFont,padding:CardConstants.PDFDimensions.padding,paddingBottom:CardConstants.PDFDimensions.padding/2,position:"absolute",left:0,bottom:25,maxLines:1,textTransform:"uppercase"},textSub:{fontSize:CardConstants.PDFDimensions.subFont,padding:CardConstants.PDFDimensions.padding,position:"absolute",left:0,bottom:0,maxLines:1,paddingTop:0,letterSpacing:2},japaneseName:{fontFamily:'Genshin Gothic Monospace ExtraLight',color:"white",fontSize:12}});export default DynamicStylesPDF;
